mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Post( referenceDocID, postContent, postTime, posterID, title ) VALUES ( #{citeId}, #{content}, now(), #{userId}, #{title} )
mapper.select: SELECT postID as postId, referenceDocID as citeId, postContent as content, postTime as createTime, sectorID as sectorId, title as title FROM Post WHERE postId = #{postId}
